trackAndAddCriminalToWatchlist: Welcome! Track high risk criminals and add criminals to your watchlist!
ClickForCriminalDetails: Click on the criminal ID to view criminal details
AddCriminalIdToWatchlist: Add a criminal ID here to add to watchlist!
SearchCIDUsingBox: Search with the Criminal ID using the box!
ClickToOpenLeftMap: Click on the arrow on the left of each row to open map!
Name: Name:
UploadPicToVerifyAndAdd: Welcome! Upload the photo you have to verify and add to the sighting database!
DropFilesOrClickToUpload: Drop your files here or click to upload
SuccessfulImageUpload: Your image has been uploaded successfully. It is now being processed by the Deep Learning Core. Please wait ...
FileSize: The uploaded file is of size
UploadError: There was an error while uploading the file!
SuccessfulCriminalMatch: The image matches the criminal database records! Detected Criminal ID:
AddToDetections: Do you want to add this record to the detections list?
UnsuccessfulCriminalMatch: Sorry :(. The uploaded image does not match our criminal database records. Please try another image.
UploadVideoToVerifyAndAdd: Welcome! Upload the video footage you have to verify and add to the sighting database!
SuccessfulVideoUpload: Your video has been uploaded successfully. Thank you for contributing to the dataset!
